thawada, sidu winayi kiyanu labana deshapalanamaya washayen paliganimata lak kirime kriyawaliya mangin rajaye niladharayange, rajya sansthawanhi sewa niyukthikayinge, sannaddha hamuda saha polis sewaye samajikayinge karya sadhanaya kerehi salakiya yuthu srunathmaka balapamak athi karanu laba athi athara ehi prathipalayak washayen swakiya rajakari itu karalime di thirana ganimata eki niladharayan, sewa niyukthikayin saha samajikayin akamaththak dakwa athi athara elesin akamaththak dakwamin swakiya wada katayuthu kerehi nishkriya praweshayakin kriya kirimata wadi kamaththak dakwima hethuwen rajaye karyayan kerehi ahithakara balapamak siduwemin athi baw mage dana ganimata yomu karanu laba athi heyin da thama mema komishan sabhawa path karana bawa janadhipathi rajapaksha anka 2157/44 darana gasat pathrayehi sandahan kara thibe.

daruwan apayojanayata ha apacharayata lakwime pa්rawanathawa ada lokaya purama wyaptha wi atha.eeta sapekshawa lama shramaya sura kama salakiya yuthu mattamakin aduwi athayi loka kamkaru sanwidhanaya pawasanawa.wadehi yodawana lamunge sankhyawa pasugiya wasara hathara athulatha koti atakata aasanna mattamakin pahatha wati athi bawa aluthma soya ganim anuwa loka kamkaru sanwidhanaya penwa denawa.wisheshayenma gahanu daruwan wadehi yedawima adu wemin pawathima yahapath wardhanayak bawa ema sanwidhanaya pawasanawa.pirimi daruwan wadehi yodawanu labima 25% kin aduwemin thibiyadi gahanu daruwan wadehi yoda ganu labima 40% kin pamana pahatha wati athayi loka kamkaru sanwidhanaya wadiduratath sandahan karayi.lamun wadehi yoda ganima walakwima bhara loka kamkaru sanwidhanaye jathyanthara wyapruthiye adhyakshika konstans thomas kiya sitiye,lama shrama bhawithaya sahamulinma uputa damima sandaha itu kala yuthu thawath boho de athi bawayi.

haththawa dashakayedi kala lowe gaman arambai miltan ranganaye menma niwedanayeth handa shilpayeth eka lesa daskam dakwana janapriya charithayak.1973 wasaredi niwedanaya karamin merata janapriyama gayaka gayikawan rasak wedikawata kandawime bhagya uda karagath ohu 1976 wasara wana wita pasubim handa shilpiyeku lesa da thawath piyawarak idiriyata thabiya.‘pragathi’, ‘sujatha’, ‘eka ahasak yata’, ‘maha gedara’, ‘subhanya’, ‘chinthi’, ‘sujatha diyani’, ‘susuran’, wani teli natya menma ‘skubi du’, ‘api raja ibbo’ katun wada satahanwalata da ohuge handa musu wiya.jathika rupawahini sansthawe ‘bi’ shreniye handa kawim shilpiyaku lesa samath miltan me wana wita rupawahini nalika kihipayakama wadasatahan rasakata handa kawimen dayaka wi thibe.kala lowe thawath mawathakata yomu wemin ohu teli natya ranganayata da piwisennata waram laba gaththeya.
